name: Shahabbasi flower
description:
Shah Abbasi was one of the flowers that goes back to the pre-Islamic period  
It has been one of the most common motifs of Iranian carpets since ancient times
Foliage, buds, and shrubs are usually scattered throughout the carpet
I have depicted these designs of Shah Abbasi with the imaginary world that I had in my mind, Flowers dancing in the imaginary world of carpets
